item.title: Amazon's switch to robots over human warehouse employees will save it up to $4 billion a year, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: "The market is under-appreciating AMZN's GenAI advances in its Retail business with robotics-driven efficiencies," analyst Brian Nowak said.
